long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: How important you are in your friend's mind? How long you don't interact with some of your friends? How many friends you don't want to contact any more for some reason? UnFriendAll can help you manage your friend list efficiently. Say goodbye to low interaction friends and have a nice touch with high interaction friends. UnFriendAll is there to help. Enjoy it!
